mapper.select: SELECT fud.file.id,fud.file.name,fud.file.suffix,fud.file.size,fud.file.download_times,fud.file.create_time FROM file WHERE fud.file.user_id= (SELECT fud.user.id FROM fud.user WHERE fud.user.username=#{username})
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO file(name, local_url, size, user_id, md5, suffix, create_time) VALUES(#{name}, #{local_url}, #{size}, #{user_id}, #{md5}, #{suffix}, #{create_time})
INSERT INTO download(create_time, user_id, file_id) VALUES (#{create_time}, #{user_id}, #{file_id})
